item.title: Songhay Publications and the Concept of the Index

item.title: A Return to Progressive Enhancement with LitHtml and `11ty` (@eleven_ty)
item.description: Who is old enough to remember what progressive enhancement is? This term is a relic from the Web 1.0 days, ending about 16 years ago. Web 1.0 will forever be marginalized by the billions made from Web 2.0 and beyond. Post-Web-1.0 is about loading a near-i‚Ä¶
